member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhone.GEDataField
member.summary: Optional property - set this to the DataField object in the GE that this control is bound to so that it will receive events automatically.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhone.OnPhoneIDValueChanged(Aptify.Framework.BusinessLogic.GenericEntity.AptifyDataFieldBase,Aptify.Framework.BusinessLogic.GenericEntity.AfterValueChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: This method handles the GE event for ValueChanged for the field that carries the Phones.ID link (foreign key). This method will automatically update the information in the display based on this.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhone
member.summary: This control is for displaying a single Phone in a culture-aware layout format. If using this control directly (e.g. not using it via the Phones Control), the DataField property must be provided.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhones.SelectPhoneByFieldName(System.String)
member.summary: Allows a developer to programatically select an Phone based on a field name or a displayname.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhones.DefaultComboWidth
member.summary: Default width for the combo/drop-down box that shows the list of phone numbers. Default value is 140 pixels

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhones.FindNameField(Aptify.Framework.BusinessLogic.GenericEntity.AptifyGenericEntityBase)
member.summary: This method is responsible for returning the field that has the IsNameField attribute set on it. If more than one such field is set in a given GE, the first one is returned. Lastly, if no fields have this attribute set, but there is a field that is called "Name" in the field list, that is returned. If none of the above matches are found, Nothing is returned.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhones.OnDefaultSettings
member.summary: This method is used to invoke the Default settings dialog

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebPhones
member.summary: Web Phones Control - ASP.NET 2.x+ Server Control. Automatically displays all phones within a given entity.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
